column4: hey all yo.  I searched google and the forums, but didn't find much... what's the status on AMD64 Ubuntu?
what do you mean? It works.
they're working on it, far as a I can tell
is there a significant speed boost to using AMD64?
most codecs work fine on my system
nod.  so in cost/benefit for my desktop, should I stick to i386?
I don't know, I never check what I'm playing. Most of the occasional videos I get work fine.
yes, unless you routinely run numbercrunching apps
because I routinely run numbercrunching apps ;) (medical image processing)
